    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120632</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sila med žico in valjem</string>
            <string language="en">Force between wire and cylinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft zwischen Leitung und Zylinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force entre le fil et le cylindre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força entre o fio e o cilindro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza fra legare ed il cilindro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη μεταξύ του καλωδίου και του κυλίνδρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza entre el alambre y el cilindro</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V magnetnem polju valja imamo vodnik po katerem teče tok.</string>
            <string language="en">Current carrying wire is placed in a magnetic field caused by cylinder.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktuelle tragende Leitung wird in ein 
magnetisches auffangen verursacht durch Zylinder gelegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le fil portant actuel est placé dans un champ 
magnétique provoqué par le cylindre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fio carregando atual é colocado em um campo 
magnético causado pelo cilindro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il legare trasportante corrente è disposto in un
campo magnetico causato dal cilindro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παρόν φέρνοντας καλώδιο τοποθετείται σε ένα 
μαγνητικό πεδίο που προκαλείται από τον κύλινδρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El alambre que lleva actual se coloca en un campo
magnético causado por el cilindro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del amperio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
